link_desc:
It is a tools written in PowerShell, which helps deliver to the monitoring system (Zabbix) operational data - metrics and settings obtained from the Windows Server Update Services Server via API, provided by Microsoft. Zabbix's Low-level Discovery (LLD) protocol are supported.

Script & template will shown:

  • WSUS Status (Number of Approved/Declined/Expired/etc updates, full/partially/unsuccess updated clients and so);
  • Synchronization process status;
  • Last Synchronization data;
  • WSUS Database related info;
  • Computer group statistic.

Zabbix's LLD available to:

  • Computer group.

Tested on WSUS 3, WSUS 6
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent|Zabbix Agent Active|Custom Script
